StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_CheckWaiverOverride]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NWAID int, @WaiverOverrides int OUTPUT AS
SELECT @WaiverOverrides = COUNT(*)
FROM CANDIDATE_WAIVER ,WAIVER ,WAIVER_CATEGORY ,WAIVER_TYPE ,WAIVER_LEVEL
WHERE CANDIDATE_WAIVER.NWA_ID = @NWAID AND WAIVER_CATEGORY_CODE + WAIVER_TYPE_CODE + WAIVER_LEVEL_CODE = 'XYB' AND CANDIDATE_WAIVER.WAIVER_ID = WAIVER.WAIVER_ID AND WAIVER.WAIVER_CATEGORY_ID = WAIVER_CATEGORY.WAIVER_CATEGORY_ID AND WAIVER.WAIVER_TYPE_ID = WAIVER_TYPE.WAIVER_TYPE_ID AND WAIVER.WAIVER_LEVEL_ID = WAIVER_LEVEL.WAIVER_LEVEL_ID
